ListInstance.Title: Important Messages
ListInstance.Description: Stores messages that can be displayed using the Important Messages App Part

Row.Field: This is an example of a critical message

Important announcements that affect the users of your website can use the provided critical category to convey the priority of the communication. An example of the typical scenario for the critical message type is a current system or power outage.
This is an example of a warning message

This category can be used to convey messages that users should be aware of that may have an impact on their work or use of the site. For example, upcoming maintenance windows may use a warning message.
This is an example of an information message
This type of message can be used to make site-wide announcements that users may find useful. These are typically low-priority communications that may be of interest to the users.
